scripts.install:all: cd admin && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build:admin: cd admin && npm run build && rm -rf ../server/public/admin && mkdir -p ../server/public/admin && cp -R dist/* ../server/public/admin/
scripts.build:client: cd client && flutter build web --release && rm -rf ../server/public/client && mkdir -p ../server/public/client && cp -R build/web/* ../server/public/client/
scripts.build: npm run build:admin && npm run build:client
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd admin && npm run dev"
